author: pipermerriam
content: Has anyone looked through Pectra to see if there's changes that we need to make?

author: kolbyml
content:
For history network we need to do

[EIP-7702: Set EOA account code](<https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7702>) A new transaction type was added
[EIP-7685: General purpose execution layer requests](<https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7685>) here the block header is extended

For the beacon network we need to update some stuff, mostly types

[EIP-6110: Supply validator deposits on chain](<https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6110>)
[EIP-7251: Increase the MAX_EFFECTIVE_BALANCE](<https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7251>)
[EIP-7549: Move committee index outside Attestation](<https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7549>)

We don't need to implement anything for this one, but thought it would be interesting to share [EIP-2935: Serve historical block hashes from state](<https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2935>)

Then there are a few relevant things for Trin Execution, but that is a little off topic here
